overview: This is the L'Enfant Sauvage bonus DVD featuring Gojira performing live at Les Eurock√©ennes.  Tracklist is as follows:  Oroborus, The Heaviest Matter of the Universe, Backbone, Love, A Sight to Behold, The Art of Dying, Drum Solo, Clone, Flying Whales, Toxic Garbage Island, Vacuity
title: Gojira: L'Enfant Sauvage
